content.rendered:
MONOCHROMATIC POWER SUITS

Monochromatic power suits will get you through Summer and Fall with beautiful, bold colors that look even more powerful in a suit. This look is inspired by the high fashion of the 1980s and 1990s but with a clean modern twist. Pair it will a bold statement earring, accessories, and a designer power bag.

Green and blue monochromatic power suits are both Balenciaga. The top green bag is also Balenciaga and the bottom blue bag is Bottega Veneta. Gold earrings are by Bottega Veneta from FWRD.com and the gold wraparound watch is Cartier.

I usually wear all black when I am lashing out, so I wear to rock a bold color whenever I can. Pair it with sleek, shiny hair, a nude lip, and bold lashes (like these D’Luscious lashes), and your confidence will be unmatched!

After a long day of wearing power suits, I love to come home to the relaxing glow of the D’Lashes luxury candles.

I know that this year has been difficult for so many people, and I am hoping that by taking the time to talk about fun things – like fashion and beauty – you can escape all of the chaos, even just for a few minutes. What are you doing to hold onto a sense of normalcy in 2020? What would you like to read more about? Let us know in the comments or shoot us a DM on Instagram. We’d love to hear from you!

Wishing you all tons of love, health, and safety!

XO XO, Dionne 

 P.S. Shop D’Lashes Beauty, Your One on One Live Lash Session, Candles, and A-List Strip Lashes Here.
